vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Related to: νόσσαξ, ακος, ὁ,
(νοσσός) chick, cockerel, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
chick, young (of a bird)
a brood, of young birds, Lk. 13:34*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 鳥巢 (不見於新約聖經)
2) 一窩孵出的小鳥 (路 13:34)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 鸟巢 (不见于新约圣经)
2) 一窝孵出的小鸟 (路 13:34)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: ổ gà con; ổ trứng ấp. Xem G3556.
